name: mxtools-pdf-encrypt
description: A Node.js wrapper for a .NET console application, designed specifically for Linux environments. This package facilitates easy encryption and decryption of PDF files. It features two primary functions: PdfEncryptFromFile, which encrypts PDF files directly from the file path, and PdfEncryptFromBase64, which handles PDF encryption from a base64 string. Both functions support owner and user password settings for enhanced security. Ideal for Node.js projects requiring secure handling of PDF documents.
author: Equipo  QS
